popularityCurve.label: again and again the southern violators have answered dr king's peaceful protests with intimidation and violence they have bombed his home almost killing his wife and child they have 376 u s 254 258 assaulted his person they have arrested him seven times for speeding loitering and similar offenses and now they have charged him with perjury a felony under which they could imprison him for ten years
